Hi, I'm Konstantin Naumov.

I am a person with a passion for crafting beautiful interfaces and usable experiences that people love. Knowing the value of making reliable UI stuff for back-end coders I focus on writing clean, elegant and efficient code. Here are fields I am excited of:

Responsive Layouting
Making web for every device
Client-side Coding
High-level website interactivity
Interface Design
Latest trends and standarts
Modern Web Tools
New tendencies, APIs, techniques.

I want to be involved in projects that I can be proud of, join an amazing team, and advance my design and development career. Take some time to look at my works, experiences, and if you’re interested in helping me make this happen…

...let’s get in touch!

My core skills

High-quality page layouts
  • Cross-browser stylesheets
  • Dynamic vector manipulation
  • JavaScript programming
  • CMS setup and templating
  • Improving user experience

I convert designs into clean, cross browser compatible, troubleproof layouts. Well formed pages are produced on every iteration of employer's development lifecycle.
Human readability and semantics of my resulting code are powered by frontend toolboxes and modern template engines.

Styling is essential and pretty complicated part of progressive web application. To maintain cross-browser and cross-devise consistency I build my stilesheets based on front-end frameworks.
With help of CSS preprocessors and mixin libraries I keep project styles DRY and structured. When it comes to sufficiently large applications I begin with CSS authoring frameworks.

Growing number of high DPI displays nowdays affects quality requirements for a regular web app. Scalable vector graphics bring an ability to create crystal clear user interfaces and very high quality cross-platform animations.
To deliver such experience to user I craft elements with support of powerful JavaScript SVG libraries.

JavaScript is mine core skill in making interactive web and jQuery is very useful thing for me as well as for industry.
I'm very familiar with DOM interfacing that brings ability to take any aspect of webpage under control instantly. I've also put my hands on CoffeeScript and keep going so.

I mostly do front-end development but occasionally I get my hands dirty with some backend (mostly php/MySQL). And I create WordPess templates time after time.
Also I really love dealing with static site generators like this one or that one to obtain maximum performance.

In every project I try to create higly dinamic user experience by turning beautiful design files into working product.

Let's get in touch.

Twitter is my way to share things of interest. I push projects to GitHub and create personal handcrafts on CodePen. I also connect with people on LinkedIn. You can always email me, and i’ll get back to your inquiry asap.
